original_title: クラスメイトのお姉ちゃんは超美人！ある日、その友人の家に遊びに行くと、超美人のお姉ちゃんがリビングのソファで泥●してパンツ丸出しで爆睡中！コッソリお姉ちゃんの恥ずかしい写真を激写！
overview: ○ When I Visited My Classmate's Friend's House At School, My Friend's Older Sister Was Super Beautiful And She Was Asleep On The Sofa In The Living Room With Her Panties Bare! Just at this time, I secretly took embarrassing pictures, later threatened my sister with this as a story, and I wanted to do cosplay, soft SM, lotion play, and adult toy play.
title: My Classmate's Sister is Fine as Hell! I Took Some Pictures of Her Lying Drunk in her Friend's House And Use Them To Blackmail Her
